title: Subpart 362-5 - Rules Relating To The Direct Payment Market Stop Loss Relief Program And State Funded Stop Loss Relief For The Healthy New York Program
content:
Subpart 362-5 - Rules Relating To The Direct Payment Market Stop Loss Relief Program And State Funded Stop Loss Relief For The Healthy New York Program

State Regulations
§ 362-5.1 - Definitions applicable to the direct payment market stop loss relief program and state funded stop loss relief for the healthy new york program
§ 362-5.2 - Eligibility of claims paid for reimbursement from the stop loss funds
§ 362-5.3 - Rating of products eligible for claims reimbursements
§ 362-5.4 - Stop loss fund administration
§ 362-5.5 - Data filing requirements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
